title: ZAWNAWLNA
lyrics:
Zaiin ka hril dawn i hmangaihna hi 525
Zaiin rawn hril la ka hnenah 315
Zan a lo thleng dawn thawk ru 382
Zan a lo thleng mek e muang lovin bei ru 526
Zan lungngaihthlak Zion pindan chhungah 212
Zan thiang reh lai takin 91
Zan tlai khaw thiang karah 118
Zawlnei hril lawk angin Lal Krista chu 97
Zawlneiten an hrilh lawk Lal Messia kha 110
Zing thla zarin han leng ila 518
Zingah chi tha tuhin min hmangaihna chi kha 383
Zingah savaten Pathian an fak a 6
Zion tlang leh van arsi mawi 497
Zoram hmangaihtu Lalpa 343
Zual zelin ka fak chak hle che 66
